title: App crashes if open chat with request message after upgrade [send]
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: App crashes if open 1-1 chat with ETH request from another contact after app was  upgraded from 0.9.9 to build with `/send` PR. 

#### Expected behavior
Chat is shown with a request
#### Actual behavior
App crashes

### Reproduction

- as contact A: Open Status 0.9.9 installed from PlayStore
- as contact B: send ETH request to contact A 
- as contact A: install `/send` PR build on top of 0.9.9 to upgrade it
- as contact A: open 1-1 chat with B -> crash

### Additional Information
* Status version: 0.9.9
* Operating System: 
contact A: Real device Samsung Galaxy S6, Android 6.0.1
contact B: Real device iPhone 6s, iOS 10.2.1

### Full log

[log2812.log.txt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/1111593/log2812.log.txt)
### Exception
